abstract: Editorial repudiates proposal by Ohio lawmakers to allow people with concealed-carry licenses to bring their loaded guns into day care centers and other public places; blames gun lobby for pressuring lawmakers nationwide to extend range of concealed-carry, except, notably, into statehouses.
lead_paragraph: A vote against an Ohio measure that extends concealed-carry privileges would be a rare vote for sanity.

headline.main: Packing Guns in the Day Care Center
headline.print_headline: Packing Guns in the Day Care Center

snippet: A vote against an Ohio measure that extends concealed-carry privileges would be a rare vote for sanity.

keywords.value: Moms Demand Action for Gun Sense in America
keywords.name: organizations
